language.dpinstTitle: Welcome to Android adb-USB UnifL Installer!
language.welcomeIntro: -Supported devices: -Sony Phones/Tablets -Sony-Ericsson -Samsung -Dell Tablets/Phones -Google -Huawei Phones/Tablets -Nook/Nook Color -Moto G/X -Proscan -Lenovo -THL -HTC -iOcean -Advent -Tolino -Motorolla -Xiaomi -One -Kiano.
language.installHeaderTitle: Installing Android USB UnifL driver, Please wait ...
language.finishTitle: Congratulations! You are finished Android USB UnifL driver installation!
language.finishText: Enjoy using the Android USB UnifL driver.
